original_title: New British envoy visits Gangaramaya Temple
original_body_lines: Newly appointed British High Commissioner to Sri Lanka Andrew Patrick visited the Gangaramaya Temple today to invoke blessings on his new appointment. During the visit, Deputy Incumbent of the temple Ven. Dr. Kirinde Assaji Thera presented the High Commissioner with the book “Twentieth Century Impressions of Ceylon" published by the Gangaramaya Temple. Pix by Nimalsiri Edirisinghe
